data.name: kstidPastePicMultiParaFld
data.value: Sorry, for now strings containing pictures can be pasted only in multiple-paragraph fields.
data.comment: Text for exception in EditPaste

data.name: kstidMiscError
data.comment: used as title for an error message box

data.name: kstidMiscErrorWithMessage
data.comment: Displayed in a message box when an exception was caught.

data.name: kstidOutOfMemory
data.comment: Displayed in a message box when system/program runs out of memory.

data.name: kstidGotException
data.value:
Please email this bug report to {0}.
Please insert here your description of how the problem occurred. If possible give detailed instructions for making it happen. If relevant please attach any files required for making it happen.
------Generated error details follow------
An internal error has been detected in program {1}, Version: {2} Details follow:
A programming error ({3}) has been detected in module {4}, {5}. Please report this to the developers.
Stack Dump: {6}
data.comment: Copied to clipboard when exception is caught.

data.name: kstidSupportEmail
data.comment: Email address. Needs to be set for each program.

data.name: kstidProgError
data.value: A programming error has occurred. A message with instructions on how to send it to the developers has been copied to the clipboard. Paste the contents of the clipboard into a new email message or text file.
data.comment: Displayed in a message box.

data.name: kstidFatalError
data.value:
In order to protect your data, the FieldWorks program needs to close.
You should be able to restart it normally.
data.comment: Displayed in a message box.

data.name: kstidWindowListHelp
data.value: Click on the window you want to switch to.
data.comment: Displayed for menu window list help

data.name: kstidMoreWindows
data.comment: Dynamically displayed menu item

data.name: kstidStyleChangeError
data.value: Sorry, your selection has been lost, due to the complications of renaming your styles. Please reapply your style change

data.name: kstidInvalidInstallation
data.value: FieldWorks software is not installed correctly. Please insert your FieldWorks CD or re-run the Installer and repair your installation.

data.name: kstidOpenProjError
data.value: An error has occurred while opening project {0}: {1}
data.comment: Displayed in a non-fatal error reporting box when an error occurs while opening an existing project ({0}). {1} is the internal error message.

data.name: kstidNewProjError
data.value: An error has occurred while creating a new project.
data.comment: Displayed in a dialog box when an error occurs while creating a new project.

data.name: kstidPageSetupWithViewName
data.comment: Title of the Page Setup dialog that also shows the name of the print layout view.

data.name: kstidPubPageTooBig
data.value: The publication page size is bigger than the paper size.
data.comment: error message from Page Setup dialog

data.name: kstidMarginsTooBig
data.value: The margins are bigger than the publication page size.
data.comment: error message from Page Setup dialog

data.name: kstidVerticalMarginsAndGutterTooBig
data.value: The settings for the top and bottom margins and gutter are too large for the page height.
data.comment: error message from Page Setup dialog (for top-bound publications)

data.name: kstidVerticalMarginsTooBig
data.value: The settings for the top and bottom margins are too large for the page height.
data.comment: error message from Page Setup dialog (for side-bound publications)

data.name: kstidHorizontalMarginsAndGutterTooBig
data.value: The settings for the inside and outside margins and gutter are too large for the page width.
data.comment: error message from Page Setup dialog (for side-bound publications)

data.name: kstidHorizontalMarginsTooBig
data.value: The settings for the inside and outside margins are too large for the page width.
data.comment: error message from Page Setup dialog (for top-bound publications)

data.name: kstidDeleteProjWarning
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the selected projects?
data.comment: Warning message when trying to delete a FieldWorks project

data.comment: Caption for the message box when deleting a FieldWorks project

data.name: kstidDeleteProjFolder
data.value: Do you also want to delete the entire project folder for {0}, including all linked files (for example, picture, sound, or movie files)?
data.comment: Message displayed when deleting a FieldWorks project

data.name: kstidConfirmDeleteProject
data.comment: Confirmation message displayed when deleting a FieldWorks project

data.name: kstidDeleteProjError
data.comment: Error message when deleting a database fails

data.name: kstidEditFindPrevMsg

data.name: kstidEditDeleteMsg

data.name: kstidViewStatusBarMsg
data.value: Show or hide the Status bar.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the view status bar menu option.

data.name: kstidViewSideBarMsg
data.value: Show or hide the Side bar.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the view side bar menu option.

data.name: kstidFormatStyleMsg
data.value: Open a dialog to add, delete, or change styles.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the styles menu option.

data.name: kstidRemoveCharStyleMsg
data.value: Remove the character style formatting from the current selection.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the remove character style formatting menu option.

data.name: kstidRemoveParaStyleMsg
data.value: Reset the style of the current paragraph to the default paragraph style.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the reset paragraph style formatting menu option.

data.name: kstidUserPropertiesMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the user properties menu option.

data.name: kstidNewWindowMsg
data.value: Opens another identical second window containing the same data.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the new window menu option.

data.name: kstidWindowCascadeMsg
data.value: Arranges open windows to be cascade from top left to bottom right.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the window cascade menu option.

data.name: kstidWindowTileStackedMsg
data.value: Arranges open windows to be equal heights, displayed one on top of the other
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the tile, stacked menu option.

data.name: kstidWindowTileSideBySideMsg
data.value: Arranges open windows to be of equal widths, displayed side-by-side
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the tile, side-by-side menu option.

data.name: kstidPageWidth
data.comment: This is the text that is shown in the zoom combobox when the zoom is the page width

data.name: kstidWritingSystemItemName
data.comment: Item name for the writing system selector control on the toolbar. Also used as a column header in controls that display a list of multilingual properties.

data.name: kstidWSTooltip
data.comment: Text for the writing system selector toolbar tooltip

data.name: kstidWizFinishButtonText
data.comment: Text for the Finish buttons on wizards.

data.name: kstidWizForwardButtonText
data.comment: Text for the Next buttons on wizards.

data.name: kstidWizStepLabel
data.comment: Text and format of label on wizards indicating what step user is on out of total number of steps.

data.name: kstidOldDbVersionUpdateMsg
data.value: The {0} database needs to be updated from version {1} to version {2}.{3}{3}Performing this update could take a while. Do you want to continue with the Update?
data.comment: Shows the database and dbversion and appversion

data.name: kstidOldDbVersionRemoteMsg
data.value: Unable to Update {0} on {1} from version {2} to {3}.{4}You need to update the database on the local machine.
data.comment: Shows the database and dbversion and appversion and asks to update elsewhere

data.name: kstidInsertPictureError
data.comment: Caption for message box when unable to insert a picture

data.name: kstidInsertSoundFileError
data.comment: Caption for message box when unable to insert a sound file

data.name: kstidInsertMovieFileError
data.comment: Caption for message box when unable to insert a movie file

data.name: kstidEncodingConverterInUseError
data.value: Cannot remove encoding converter because it is currently in use by a writing system.
data.comment: Content for message box when an encoding converter is in use by a writing system.

data.name: kstidEncodingConverterInUseErrorCaption
data.comment: Caption for message box when an encoding converter is in use by a writing system.

data.name: kstidDuplicateStyleError
data.value: Cannot add style {0} because a style with this name already exists.
data.comment: Content for message box when user attempts to add a duplicate style.

data.name: kstidBlankStyleNameError
data.value: Cannot add a style with a blank name.
data.comment: Content for message box when user attempts to add a style with a blank name.

data.name: kstidCreateShortcutLinkDescription
data.comment: Shortcut description for a project shortcut created on the desktop. {0} is the database name and {1} is the application name.

data.name: kstidTrainingAvailable
data.comment: Caption for FirstTimeMessage, to advertise training.

data.name: kstidChooserDlgTitle
data.comment: This is the format string for setting the title of the Chooser dialog

data.name: kstidUpdatePageBreakWindowCaption
data.comment: This is the text for caption of the progress dialog when updating the page breaks

data.name: kstidUpdatePageBreakButtonText
data.comment: This is the text for the stop button on the progress dialog when updating the page breaks

data.name: kstidUpdatePageBreakPageCount
data.comment: This is the format string for displaying the pages that have been done when updating the page breaks

data.name: kstidCreatingStylesCaption
data.comment: This is the caption for the progress dialog used when loading factory (default) styles. The argument is a label from the XML file describing the group of styles.

data.name: kstidCreatingStylesStatusMsg
data.comment: This is the status message for the progress dialog used when loading factory (default) styles. (Creating styles requires up to four passes. The message is for the first pass.)

data.name: kstidUserStyleSuffix
data.comment: Suffix to add onto a user-defined style in case a new factory style name conflicts with an existing user style.

data.name: kstidDeletingStylesStatusMsg
data.comment: This is the status message for the progress dialog used when removing factory (default) styles. (Creating styles requires up to four passes. The message is for the third pass.)

data.name: kstidReplacingStylesStatusMsg
data.value: Replacing or removing uses of former styles...
data.comment: This is the status message for the progress dialog used when searching all data for uses of renamed or deleted styles. (Creating styles requires up to four passes. The message is for the fourth pass.)

data.name: kstidUpdatingStylesStatusMsg
data.comment: This is the status message for the progress dialog used when creating factory (default) styles. (Creating styles requires up to four passes. The message is for the second pass.)

data.name: kstidNoWritingSystems
data.value: FieldWorks project has no current {0} writing systems.
data.comment: Message box displayed if count of current vernacular/analysis writing systems is 0. (parameter is either verncaular or analysis)

data.name: kstidWarning
data.comment: Title for warning message box

data.name: kstidInitWindow
data.comment: Splash screen message

data.name: kstidNoFilterItemName
data.comment: The name for the no filters menu item

data.name: ksPercentage
data.comment: If there is a different percent character for a culture, then this needs to get it.

data.name: ksEllipsis
data.comment: ellipsis - mark showing missing words, "more to come", or more info than is displayed.

data.name: kstidPaperSizeA4
data.comment: for list of paper sizes in Page Setup dialog

data.name: kstidPaperSizeA5
data.comment: for list of paper sizes in Page Setup dialog

data.name: kstidPaperSizeCustom
data.comment: for list of paper sizes in Page Setup dialog

data.name: kstidPaperSizeLegalStd
data.comment: for list of paper sizes in Page Setup dialog--standard legal size

data.name: kstidPaperSizeLegalPhil
data.comment: for list of paper sizes in Page Setup dialog--legal size in the Philippines

data.name: kstidPaperSizeLetter
data.comment: for list of paper sizes in Page Setup dialog

data.name: kstidFullPage
data.comment: for list of publication sizes in Page Setup dialog

data.name: kstidTruncatingPaste
data.value: The string being pasted has been truncated from {0} to {1} characters so as not to exceed the maximum field length of {2} characters.

data.name: kstidGutterTooBig
data.value: The gutter is too big for the publication page to fit on the selected paper size.
data.comment: error message from Page Setup dialog

data.name: kstidIncompatibleStyleExists
data.value: Style {0} could not be added because an incompatible style with the same name already exists.
data.comment: Error message when someone adds a style that has been added on another machine that is incompatible (e.g. because of different context, structure, etc).

data.name: kstidParatextLanguageFiles
data.comment: Used in the Browse for Language File filter accessed from the Valid Characters dialog box

data.name: kstidToolboxLanguageFiles
data.comment: Used in the Browse for Language File filter accessed from the Valid Characters dialog box

data.name: kstidCurrentScriptureProject
data.comment: Combo box entry on From Data tab of Valid Characters dialog box

data.name: kstidFileLineRef
data.comment: Line number label displayed on From Data tab in valid characters dialog box.

data.name: kstidCannotModifyWS
data.comment: caption for error message box

data.name: kstidErrorModifyingWS
data.value: The writing system could not be modified. There is a problem in your language definition. See the FieldWorks ReadMe for help in this area.

data.name: kstidNotBaseCharErrorMsg
data.comment: Message displayed under a character in the valid chars. dialog when the character is not a valid base character.

data.name: kstidUndefinedCharactersMsg
data.value: The following characters are not defined. Therefore, they will not be added to the valid characters list.
data.comment: Error message when trying add a range of undefined characters in the valid characters dialog box.

data.name: kstidUndefinedCharacterMsg
data.value: That character is undefined and cannot be added.
data.comment: Error message when trying add an undefined character in the valid characters dialog box.

data.name: kstidSectionHeading
data.comment: {0} is a Scripture reference like 1:1-2:3; compare to kstidScriptureTitle

data.name: kstidCannotUndo
data.value: This undo action is not possible because it conflicts with changes made in another window.
data.comment: Error message when an action on the undo stack cannot be undone.

data.name: kstidCannotRedo
data.value: This redo action is not possible because it conflicts with changes made in another window.
data.comment: Error message when an action on the redo stack cannot be redone.

data.name: kstidUndoFailed
data.comment: Error message when a single undo action fails.

data.name: kstidRedoFailed
data.comment: Error message when a single redo action fails.

data.name: kstidUndoFailureReport
data.value: Of the {0} undo actions attempted, only the first {1} succeeded.
data.comment: Error message when one or more undo actions in a batch fails.

data.name: kstidRedoFailureReport
data.value: Of the {0} redo actions attempted, only the first {1} succeeded.
data.comment: Error message when one or more redo actions in a batch fails.

data.name: kstidUILangNotFound
data.value: FieldWorks does not recognize '{0}' as a valid user interface language ID. English will be used instead.
data.comment: Message displayed at startup if the user's version of Windows is not supported in the user interface, or if the user specifies a language on the command line (using the 'locale' command-line option) that isn't supported. The parameter is the language id that was not found as part of the FW installation.

data.name: kstidPunctCheckWhitespaceChar
data.comment: Single character representing a whitespace character (or possibly multiple contiguous whitespace characters) when displayed in the punctuation patterns grid and the punctuation check. Typically, this is the space character (U+0032); for greater visibility, an underscore (_) character could be used.

data.name: kstidUnableToFindEditorialChecks
data.value: Unable to find any DLL files containing editorial checks in folder {0}.
data.comment: Error message when the folder where the editorial checks are supposed to be installed is missing or empty.

data.name: kstidUndoRedoInsertRelatedWord
data.comment: Displayed in the Undo/Redo drop down
